name: REPAIR THE GAME
description:
First, I'd like to thank the people who came up with the theme for making me create the silliest game I possibly could create.

REPAIR THE GAME is a very short first person puzzle game that asks the question: 'What if the developer could not finish the level design aspect of the game on time?'

Controls:

WASD - Move around

Mouse - Look around

Spacebar - Jump

E - Pick up objects

ESC - Quit

R - Restart
